update robot
robot_num = #{robotNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
robot_mn_id = #{robotMnId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
product_date = #{productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deploy_date = #{deployDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
maintian_time = #{maintianTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
charge_time = #{chargeTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},

updMark = #{updmark,jdbcType=BIGINT},
opUserId = #{opuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
opTime = #{optime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where robot_id = #{robotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
